mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_cost (business_job_cost, final_job_cost, date_from, date_to, contractual_level, bill_center, id_user) VALUES (#{business_job_cost}, #{final_job_cost}, #{date_from}, #{date_to}, #{contractual_level}, #{bill_center}, #{id_user});
mapper.update: UPDATE job_cost SET business_job_cost = #{business_job_cost}, final_job_cost = #{final_job_cost}, date_from = #{date_from}, date_to = #{date_to}, contractual_level = #{contractual_level}, bill_center = #{bill_center}, id_user = #{id_user} WHERE id = #{id};
